column4: Eastern and Southern African Trade and Development Bank (PTA Bank)
column5: Eastern and Southern African Trade and Development Bank (PTA Bank)
column6: The Eastern and Southern African Trade and Development Bank (PTA Bank) provides a range of financial services to businesses and enterprises. The company offers project and infrastructure finance and participates in the investment of government securities and other non-listed equity investments. It also offers insurance and real estate rental services. PTA Bank was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bujumbura, Burundi.

Arabian Food Industries (Domty) is a manufacturer of juice and dairy products. The company produces a variety of juices including apple, orange, pineapple, and mango, as well as an assortment of cheese including mozzarella, feta, and cheddar. It was founded in 1990 and is based in Giza, Egypt.

Huajian Group engages in the production of shoes. It operates three main production bases in China and has more than a dozen subsidiaries. The company was established in 1996 and is based in Dongguan, China.

Noguchi Holdings operates as a venture capital firm which offers solutions focused on project management, advisory services and management consultancy. The company is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan with additional locations in China, Hong Kong, Singapore and Rwanda.

WISeKey is an Internet security company which provides technologies for digital identities of people, objects, mobiles, personal clouds and authentication to secure communications and transactions. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Geneva, Switzerland.
Meinhardt, through its subsidiaries, offers engineering, planning, and management consultancy services. The company is based in Singapore.
